definitions.description: A payment card issued by a bank to an account holder enabling the account holder to make payments or purchases, paying back the balance to the issuing bank, plus interest.

constantValues: A payment card issued by a bank to an account holder enabling the account holder to make payments or purchases, paying back the balance to the issuing bank, plus interest.

members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.description: The customer associated with the card.

members.name: cardNetwork
members.description: This is the credit card network, such as Visa, Mastercard, or American Express.

members.name: dateoflastcashwithdrawal
members.description: The date of the last cash withdrawal transaction performed with the card.

constantValues: The date of the last cash withdrawal transaction performed with the card.

members.name: dateoflasttransaction

members.description: The number of cash withdrawal transactions made on the card each month.

constantValues: The number of transactions made on the card each month.

members.name: purchasingLimit
members.description: The maximum amount that the customer can spend using the card.

members.description: Value of the purchasing limit in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the purchasing limit in base currency.

members.description: The total amount that the customer can spend on the card. Value should be converted to base currency.

members.name: status
members.description: The status of the card (i.e. active, not active, stolen etc.).

members.name: withdrawalLimit
members.description: The maximum amount that the customer can withdraw as cash using the card.

members.description: Value of the withdrawal limit in base currency.
